instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]Display for an A1398 showing blemishes.
threads.message:
Quick question, as I have never heard of this before.

I replaced an display assembly on an A1398 and the display has light blue-ish blemishes on the picture under certain colours.

The supplier is telling me it's static build up in the display.

Anyone heard of this, am I being bull-dusted?

threads.title: [SOLVED]Display for an A1398 showing blemishes.
threads.message: it's just a crappy screen. realize that most of the screens available for sale are factory rejects. depending on what you paid for it, that may be all  that you can expect.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Display for an A1398 showing blemishes.
threads.message:
Thanks Louis.

I suspected that was the case.
